comments.content:
Yeah, I also thought that title intro bit is pretty amazing.  
 [MK12](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705162328/http:/www.mk12.com/) are very good at such motion graphics.

Yes, the titles are brilliant.  
I travelled through Afghanistan in 1970, and thought the movie did a nice job of recreating the atmosphere of a happier time there.  
That, I feel, is more instructive than any message the story conveys.

Freekin awesome titles!!! Finally someone who knows what they are doing gets to make a beauty without being told to make it all in Trajan!

ChrisL
